name: Novotel Deira City Centre

reviews.text: The hotel is located just opposite to Deira City Centre Mall. Just only 5 minutes walk to the Maill and Deira City Centre Metro station. The room is very clean, modern and quiet. Free Wifi at the lobby. When we called a taxi, they always introduced non-meter taxis just parked at the front door of the hotel. However, when we expressed we preferred to meter taxi, they were very willing to call a taxi for us.
reviews.title: A good stay at Novotel Deira City Centre

reviews.text: I am writting this from the hotel lobby, having flown in from NZ this morning, we were meant to be checking in at 5.45am but the flight was delayed and didnt arrive untill 6.40am, we had booked early check in as we have the children with us and knew they would be very tired, it is now 9.10am and still no room, my boys are at there wits end, we are all over tired and just want to sleep................. and to be honest looking around the lobby we dont look like the only ones waiting for rooms, This is very very poor service when traveling with children, can not recomend. very sad as we were really looking forward to our Dubai stopover, and we really needed a good rest after leaving the Christchurch earthquakes behind, we are here another 2 days but to be honest this has allready put a dampener on things.
reviews.title: Do not stay here with children

reviews.text: I stayed on a 24hr transit. Conveniently placed for Deira Shopping Mall. I asked for a quiet No-Smoking room during the booking process. I'm pleased to report my request was met in full. I would like to see a few smiles from the guys working at check in, the ladies seem to manage it ok?
reviews.title: FUNCTIONAL STOPOVER LOCATION
DUBAI STOPOVER
reviews.text: Overall, a good mid budget hotel. A clean modern room, with all the required facilities. I would use it again. Well placed for the airport and Terminal 3.

We stayed here for 3 nights. Check-in was fast. Room was pretty comfortable. However, a pity since the view wasn't nice. The location is far from the sky scrapers of Dubai so no view to shout about. There is a huge shopping mall right across though.
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay

reviews.text: I really liked the bathroom. The bed was that of a queen bed. We wanted 2 twins but they didn't have twins. However, the room has a sofa bed, Thus, I slept on the sofa bed while my friend took the queen bed. Comfortable enough.
reviews.title: Very Nice
A Very Positive Hotel Experience
reviews.text: Breakfast was good with the usual mix of Middle Eastern and Western fare.

Nice Hotel, Ideally located in Deira area, facing Deira City Center mall, very close to the subway station. Clean, room comfortable, and nicely decorated, very clean, ideal for quick business trips in Dubai.
reviews.title: CLAUSTROPHOBIC TOILET NOT FOR THE LARGE

reviews.text: From the moment I checked in tot he moment I checked out, I thought that this was an excellent hotel. The staff were friendly, the hotel was spotless and the room was well appointed and maintained. The location is very convenient too - right opposite the massive Deira City Centre, one of the city's many massive shopping centres. Only a 10 minute drive to the airport too. Strongly recommended
reviews.title: Great value Hotel but initial service could be better
My stay
reviews.text: Good hotel to stay at due to the good location with a mall right in front of it and close to the airport. Good food and room service. Rooms good as well, quite,clean and secure due to you having to use your key to select the floor in the lift .

reviews.title: excellent hotel
reviews.text: And the fact that you can have 2 adults and 2 children to each room was nice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There being 2 computers with internet access in the lobby is very convenient.
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.text: hotel was very good , staff was helpful but the room size should be more, but we enjoyed, thanks to novotel , i will defiantly stay if been to dubai again, my selection for novotel diera city center was good stay, i love that, thanks indeep
reviews.title: enjoyed

description: Located in the heart of historic Dubai Novotel Deira City Centre is directly opposite to Deira City Centre shopping mall and within the business and commercial district of Port Saeed. The hotel is only 5 min from Dubai International Airport (DXB) and 15 min from Dubai World Trade Center. It offers 188 guest rooms, ideal for a business trip or family breaks in in Dubai, as well as international and regional restaurants, fully licensed bars and an outdoor temperature controlled swimming pool.
